name: Dylan
short_description: I am a web and game developer currently studying at Centennial College. I am motivated to continue developing my coding skills...

projects.title: Point of Sale
projects.description: A C# POS system with WinForms manages sales, inventory, and customer data with a user-friendly interface, real-time updates.

projects.title: URL Shortener
projects.description: A URL shortener made with vanilla JavaScript is a simple tool that takes a long URL and generates a short, unique identifier for it, making it easier to share.

projects.title: Task React
projects.description: A task webapp in React is a dynamic tool for managing to-do lists and tracking progress. It offers a user-friendly interface and efficient state management, allowing users to easily add and delete.

projects.title: Movie List
projects.description: A movie list in Next.js is a web application that displays a collection of movies, allowing users to search movies.

projects.title: Clothing E-Commerce
projects.description: QRClothing, is built in Next.js, connected with an API to request designs, and it's fully functional.

projects.title: GuideProtocol
projects.description: GuideProtocol, is built in Docsify, it's a guide for basic modding in BrokeProtocol, including Unity and Plugins.

projects.title: ChatBot connected to Instagram
projects.description: This chatbot, is built in Node.js, connected to Instagram so you can sign in, read and reply messages.

projects.title: Love calculator in Instagram
projects.description: This is built using React-Vite, connected to Instagram API.

projects.title: tbh.bio
projects.description: My social-media project. Using NextJS, Express.JS, MongoDB, etc...

projects.title: Semi-Automated YouTube videos
projects.description: My YouTube channel automatized with NextJS, and different APIs.

projects.title: Table-Generator Assignment
projects.description: Table generator assignment for Centennial College. Made with HTML/CSS and vanilla JavaScript.

about_me.professional_summary: I am a self-taught web and game developer currently studying at Centennial College. I have a good understanding of programming languages like C# and JavaScript. I enjoy learning and keeping up with the latest trends in the industry. I'm skilled at turning creative ideas into user-friendly applications. I'm also good at solving problems. I'm excited about the opportunity to contribute my skills to your projects.

experience.title: Intern | Software Developer
experience.description: Sorted and organized files, spreadsheets and reports. Analyzed problems, identified solutions and made decisions. Collaborated in professional team to solve workflow issues. Contributed to content creation for company website.

experience.title: Community Manager
experience.description: Planned and executed promotional activities to drive community engagement and increase occupancy numbers. Managed community within established cost constraints. Managed project requirements and accomplished objectives by self-monitoring progress and promptly solving issues.

experience.title: Freelance Web Developer | Fiverr
experience.description: Developed custom websites for clients with a focus on responsive design. Collaborated with clients to gather requirements and deliver tailored solutions. Received positive feedback and maintained a 5-star rating on the platform.

experience.title: Little Projects
experience.description: Designed and developed personal portfolio website showcasing my skills and projects. Created a basic mobile game app. Implemented game mechanics, user interface, and optimized performance.
